title: [1.12.2-1.10.2][Advanced Inventory Management——先进的背包管理][自带汉化]
author: skyinr
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyinr 于 2018-8-1 20:10 编辑 

 作者的话https://shimo.im/doc/THAc2G8woYwMaozT?r=EZ5M3X/「作者的话」可点击↑

mod自带一个说明书，说明书合成方法中间放书 书上面放红石 书的左右和下面都放铁锭 这个是MOD列表展示，可以看见它的名字这个是说明书总览，但是你看得懂么？教程贴http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-723002-1-1.html
这个MOD可以与其他MOD互相兼容
如果出现报错 请在本贴进行回复 我会提交给作者
只要脑洞够大 你就可以把身上所有的东西进行自动化修改推荐将这个MOD做为单人RPG地图的MOD使用这个mod可以让你在PVE（PVP也行 但不推荐）的时候自动嗑*药 没错 自动嗑*药
只要你把药水填装机与装有药水的箱子联通
再进行一些正确的设置（调成进口模式）你就可以自动嗑*药
：我嗑*药磕多了 怎么办？
：没事 你可以调成出口模式 只要你有玻璃瓶 他就可以把药水效果抽出来
：服务器里可以用吗？

：当然可以 而且别人不能使用你的机器
：我看到有一个运动管理器 这是干什么的？
：这个机器可以让你向所设置的方向移动一段距离（取决于红石信号强弱）
：装甲装填器有什么用啊？
：它可以让你的装甲在损坏后立刻更换成与装甲装填器相连接的箱子里的装甲，也可以直接移除你的装甲，也可以在还有装甲还有耐久的情况下更换装甲
：我还想了解更多
：游戏内含有说明书，说明书的内容已经很详细了。挖矿小技巧：我们先做两个插槽管理器 就像这样（不准吐槽我的摆放）




2018-07-20_17.52.07.png (174.03 KB, 下载次数: 7)

下载附件

2018-7-20 17:55 上传




左边的插槽管理器我把他调成了快捷栏第二个格子
右边的插槽管理器我调成了快捷栏第一个格子（就是拿着木镐的那个格子）
然后我们去挖矿





2018-07-20_17.53.43.png (165.14 KB, 下载次数: 6)

下载附件

2018-7-20 17:55 上传





等稿子挖爆了后 右边的插槽管理器就会把你要填装的东西给你
我在右边的插槽管理器放了钻石镐 我的木镐挖爆之后就会自动更换为钻石镐





2018-07-20_17.53.24.png (127.72 KB, 下载次数: 4)

下载附件

2018-7-20 17:55 上传





挖到的矿因为MC的机制 会自动到快捷栏第二格
这时候左边的插槽管理器就会把你挖到的东西给抽走
从而实现只带稿子去挖矿 回来身上什么都没有


以下版本自带汉化（汉化如果有问题，在贴下留言）因作者要求 只放原贴链接
1.3.0原版下载（1.12.2版本）1.4.0原版下载(1.12.2版本)
1.4.1原版下载(1.12.2版本)




1.0.1
+ Added a search function to the Inventory Management Manual, type on the main page to search for entries
+ Added a toggle cable to switch parts of your network on and off using redstone signals
- fixed various bugs
1.1.0
+ Added the Motion Editor: Add velocity to the player based on a redstone signa
+ Added the Hotbar Selection Editor: Force the player to select a specific slot in his hotbar
+ The text on the Player Monitor now glows in the dark
- Fixed some bugs and crashes
1.1.0（游戏版本1.11）
+ Added the Motion Editor: Add velocity to the player based on a redstone signal
+ Added the Hotbar Selection Editor: Force the player to select a specific slot in his hotbar
+ The text on the Player Monitor now glows in the dark
- Fixed some bugs and crashes
1.2.0（游戏版本1.11.2）
+ Added the Position Editor and Position Card: Shift-right-click any block with the Position Card to store it’s coordinate and dimension, then right click the editor with the card. When hooked up to an active network, apply a redstone signal to the Position Editor to teleport yourself.
+ Added the Energy Relay: Transfer energy from the block to items in your player’s inventory.
+ Added a config option to make network cables traversable
+ The crafting recipe for conductor dust now outputs 12 items (instead of 8)
- Bugfixes:
            - Fixed: Liquid Experience Relay not outputting the right amount of fluid
            - Fixed: The network turning off on client side after leaving and re-entering the area
            - Fixed: Searching in the manual won’t work with uppercase letters
            - Fixed: Network not working after player death
            - Fixed some more minor bugs
1.2.0（游戏版本1.10.2）
+ Added the Position Editor and Position Card: Shift-right-click any block with the Position Card to store it’s coordinates and dimension, then right click the editor with the card. When hooked up to an active network, apply a redstone signal to the Position Editor to teleport yourself.
+ Added the Energy Relay: Transfer energy from the block to items in your player’s inventory.
+ Added a config option to make network cables traversable
- Bugfixes:
            - Fixed: Liquid Experience Relay not outputting the right amount of fluid
            - Fixed: The network turning off on client side after leaving and re-entering the area
            - Fixed: Searching in the manual won’t work with uppercase letters
            - Fixed: Network not working after player death
            - Fixed some more minor bugs1.3.0
- Updated the mod to Minecraft version 1.12.2
- Added the Network Signal Bridge: Connect two distant parts of your networks without having to build network cables
- Added the Solar Generator: Generate a small amount of power for your network just by using daylight
- Added the Shulker Box Relay: Access the content of shulker boxes within the player's inventory
- New config options for Solar Power Generation and Network Signal Bridge power drain
- The default power values have been tweaked. This will only apply if you generate a new config file
- The Inventory Management Core can now accept up to 16 Energy Upgrades
- Added Chinese translation provided by user Skyinr
- Fixed a lot of different bugs
1.4.0
Since a lot of things got changed internally, a backup of your worlds is recommended before updating!
- Completely reworked the Network Information Provider: Now shows a screen overlay while looking at any network block. It also has a new gui displaying additional information about your network, even from remote locations (open with shift-right-click). More information can be found in the manual.
- Reworked the Player Monitor: Now updates the displayed information and redstone output once per second. This should work a lot more consistent than before.
- Text messages are now displayed in the player's status bar instead of the chat box
- Simplified the internal structure to allow for easier updates
- Bugfixes for almost everything
1.4.1
- Tweaked the scanner animation and texture to look better
- Updated the chinese language file
- Bugfixes

2017-3-23更新MC1.10.2以及1.11.2的1.2.0版本
2017-9-2提交汉化
2017-11-5修改排版
2018-6-1更新MC1.11.2的1.3.0版本
2018-7-16获得授权搬运并删除除1.3.0版本以外的链接
2018-7-31更新1.4.0版本并向作者提交新的汉化文本
2018-8-1更新1.4.1版本（更新了材质 使用了新的汉化文本 修复了BUG）如果使用该MOD出现了报错，崩溃等情况可以在这里回复
记得贴上你的报错文本
